Entries.danceRejection: Oh... I'm sorry, Mr. @... but no thank you.$s^Oh... I'm sorry, Ms. @... but no thank you.$s
Entries.Mon8: You take great care of your animals, @.#$e#Trust me... I just know!
Entries.Mon10: You... You're single, aren't you, @?$4#$e#Just curious!$4
Entries.Tue10: Thanks for visiting, @!#$e#It's always nice to see you.$4
Entries.Wed10: Hi, @! Are you here to see Shane?#$e#...Oh, me?$4
Entries.Fri8: Happy Friday, @! Any plans for the weekend?
Entries.Fri10: I'll be at the saloon tonight if you want to come see me.$h
Entries.event_marnieBreakup1: I... I know. But I shouldn't have let myself get so close to y-- that person...$8
Entries.event_marnieBreakup2: ...Maybe a little.$4#$b#Still... no one deserves that.$s
Entries.event_marnieBreakup3: Um... it's... it's not important. Maybe I'll tell you later...$s
Entries.event_marnieMorning1: Oh, well it's nice to see you! Actually, it's strange you happened by...#$b#I was just thinking about how I wanted to speak to you.
Entries.event_marnieMorning2: Oh! Is that so?$4#$b#Well... actually, now that you're here, there's something I wanted to talk to you about.
Entries.event_marnieMorning3: Oh... could you spare just a moment? There's actually something I wanted to talk to you about.$s
Entries.event_loveLewis1: Oh... well, I'm sorry to hear that.$s
Entries.event_loveLewis2: Ah... so we've both experienced heartache from the same man, huh?#$b#I'm sorry to hear that, Mr. @. Really.$s^I'm sorry to hear that, Ms. @. Really.$s
Entries.event_loveLewis3: I-Is that so?$s#$b#Well... I'm glad to hear that.$a
Entries.event_loveLewis4: I'm not sure Mr. Lewis felt the same way...$s
Entries.divorced: Oh... Do you have some business here...?$s

Entries.give_flowersA: A bouquet!$6#$b#I admit I'd have accepted even a handful of hay, if it's from you.$4
Entries.give_flowersB: ...! I accept!$h#$b#I still have work here.$4#$b#But I'm sure we'll make it work.$h
Entries.give_pendant: Yes! Of course yes!$h#$b#I love you so, so much!$4#$b#Things will be awkward, but I'll go talk to Lewis about arranging our wedding.$h
Entries.stardrop_gift: 'Oh, sweetie, can you talk for a second?$4#$b#I wanted to give you this stardrop to show my love.$h#$b#Without you, I'd still be stuck in that dead-end relationship. This... is much better.$h
Entries.rejectNPCA: Huh?$4#$b#I'm sorry... but I'm not interested in you.$2
Entries.rejectNPCB: You're a good man.. but I'm not interested in that.$3^You're a good woman.. but I'm not into you.$3
Entries.reject_two_heartA: That's sweet, but I don't like you like that.$6
Entries.reject_two_heartB: Aren't we both farmers? How would you suggest we run them both?$h
Entries.reject_four_heartA: ... I wish the one I liked would give me one.$2
Entries.reject_four_heartB: I don't know how to tell you my heart belongs to another.$2
Entries.engageA: This isn't something you should be doing.$2
Entries.engageB: I hope you're not expecting me to say yes.$3
Entries.marriedB: What are you getting at showing this to me.$2
Entries.refusal_knownA: Shane is an elegible young man. Have you met him? I know he can be prickly, but...$h
Entries.refusal_knownB: Jas and Shane need me here. No, thank you.
Entries.refusal_botherB: Stop it. I've made myself clear.$s
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: I would love to get married... just not to you...$2
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: Oh... well thanks... but I need to say no.$h

Entries.give_flowersA: I'll find somewhere nice to put these.$4
Entries.give_pendant: I've already got the one from before, sweetie.$6
Entries.engageB: I only need the one, silly.$6
Entries.marriedA: We're already getting married, sweetie. Unless you think we can do it again?$h
Entries.marriedB: Where are you finding these pendants, sweetie?$h

Entries.Rainy_Day_Marnie: It's raining outside. Make sure you don't catch cold, dear.#$e#Stay indoors as much as possible.
Entries.Rainy_Night_Marnie: I made some soup for dinner. [199 218 219 727 730]$h#$e#You need something hot on a day like this!$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_Marnie: What are your plans today, sweetie?#$e#Me? I'll probably do some dusting, some dishes... Fun stuff, you know?
Entries.Indoor_Night_Marnie: It's bedtime, honey!$h#$e#I can't wait to snuggle up under the covers.$6
Entries.Outdoor_Marnie: It's a beautiful day today, isn't it?#$e#Days like this make work a little more pleasant.
Entries.spring_Marnie: Time to plant some fresh grass for the cows, eh?$h
Entries.summer_Marnie: Phew... Maybe we can install some kind of air conditioner soon, huh, @?
Entries.fall_Marnie: Animals eat too much in the fall, too...$h
Entries.winter_Marnie: Make sure the animals are warm enough, dear.$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: It's raining outside. Make sure you don't catch cold, dear.#$e#Stay indoors as much as possible.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Make sure you keep the animals inside today! They like getting wet just about as much as we do.
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: It's raining... I guess yardwork is out of the question today.$2#$e#I'll take care of some things inside instead.
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: I got up early and brewed some coffee. [395]#$e#It's good to drink warm things on days like today.
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: Rain or no rain, the day must go on!#$e#Good luck today, honey.
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Make sure you change into something warm. We can't have you getting sick!#$e#Can you hear the rain pattering on the roof, sweetie?
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: The rain makes our home seem so cozy.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: I made some soup for dinner. [199 218 219 727 730]$h#$e#You need something hot on a day like this!$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: It's nights like this I'm glad we have a quality roof.#$e#We have Ms. Robin to thank for that!
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I hope Shane cooked a nice dinner for Jas...$2#$e#She likes grilled cheese on rainy nights, for whatever reason.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Good morning, honey!$h#$e#I had a dream last night... I don't remember much of it, but it had something to do with a %adj %noun.#$e#Weird, right?
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hi, honey. I hope you're ready for another day of hard work!
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: What a beautiful day outside!#$e#Make sure you let the animals out into the pasture. They love soaking up the sun.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: What are your plans today, sweetie?#$e#Me? I'll probably do some dusting, some dishes... Fun stuff, you know?
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Hi, honey! Smells good, doesn't it? I made you breakfast! [194 195 210 211 216]#$e#Eat up! We have a long day of work ahead of us.
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Oh, you're home! How was your day, honey?$h#$e#Mine was good, but a little lonely! I'm glad you're back.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Hi, sweetie. I'm glad you're back!#$e#Dinner's ready. Eat up! [212 235 728 240]
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: Wow, you look like you did a lot of work today!#$e#You should really relax and kick back for the night.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: It's bedtime, honey!$h#$e#I can't wait to snuggle up under the covers.$6
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: How were the animals today?#$e#I popped into the barn earlier and they seemed so happy! You're doing a great job.$h
Entries.Outdoor_0: It's a beautiful day today, isn't it?#$e#Days like this make work a little more pleasant.
Entries.Outdoor_1: What beautiful weather. I'm sure the animals would love to be out grazing in the sun!
Entries.Outdoor_2: I have a little free time.#$e#What do you need me to do, sweetie?
Entries.Outdoor_3: Don't overwork yourself, honey.#$e#Make sure and take a break every now and then!
Entries.Outdoor_4: It's not much, but here you go, honey! [403]#$e#Be sure to eat that if you get hungry, and I'll have a hot dinner ready for you when you get home!
Entries.OneKid_0: I wonder if %kid1 will grow up to be a farmer like both of us?
Entries.OneKid_1: I took care of Jas for a while, so I thought raising my own child would be easy...$s#$e#Boy was I wrong!#$e#It's worth all the work, though.$h
Entries.OneKid_2: %kid1... what a wonderful name! What inspired it?$h
Entries.OneKid_3: I never thought being a mother would be so rewarding.
Entries.TwoKids_0: I never thought I'd have a family of my own like this.#$e#Life sure takes some sharp turns when you least expect it, doesn't it?
Entries.TwoKids_1: I already gave %kid1 and %kid2 their breakfast. They were hungry!
Entries.TwoKids_2: Can you check on %kid2 for me? I'm about to feed %kid1.$h
Entries.TwoKids_3: %kid1 and %kid2 are just perfect! They're such happy babies, never fussing or fighting.
Entries.Good_0: Come kiss me, handsome.$4^Come kiss me, beautiful.$4
Entries.Good_1: I always thought maybe we'd end up together.$h#$e#Of course, I wasn't expecting it... more like hoping, I guess!
Entries.Good_2: I love being here with you, @. You're my best friend.$h
Entries.Good_3: To think you chose little old me over all the girls in this town...$4
Entries.Good_4: I love being around you, @. You bring out the best in me.$h#$e#I hope you feel the same.$4
Entries.Good_5: I was just admiring my wedding amulet, honey! It's so shiny and beautiful.#$e#Where did you even find something so perfect?$h
Entries.Good_6: I still can't believe we're married...$h#$e#I mean that in the best way possible!
Entries.Good_7: Be careful out there! Sometimes I worry about you falling into a mine shaft.
Entries.Neutral_0: If you go into town, make sure and say hi to everyone for me.
Entries.Neutral_1: I hope you'd still like me even if I gained weight.$s
Entries.Neutral_2: I found this on the way home from work the other day. [535 680 567]#$e#Interesting, isn't it? I hope you can find some use for it!
Entries.Neutral_3: Are you hungry, sweetie?#$e#I'll cook soon.$h
Entries.Neutral_4: Shane's doing a great job taking care of the animal shop.#$e#And taking care of Jas, too, for that matter.@#$e#I'm so glad.$h
Entries.Neutral_5: I could go for some cake right about now...$3
Entries.Bad_0: You've been treating me so coldly lately...$s#$e#Is it someting I said?$s
Entries.Bad_1: Are you still happy with me?s
Entries.Bad_3: ...I need to be alone right now.$s
Entries.funLeave_Marnie: I'm off to work soon, honey. Don't miss me too much!
Entries.funReturn_Marnie: I'm glad to be back... Work was a killer.#$e#How was your day, sweetie?$h
Entries.spring_1: Happy New Year, honey!#$e#I'm sure you'll have your hands full clearing the field, so let me know if you need me to feed the animals!
Entries.spring_12: Shane always does such a great job preparing the chickens for the Egg Festival.#$e#He can really accomplish a lot when he puts his mind to it!
Entries.spring_23: The Flower Dance is tomorrow, honey! I'll brush up on my moves tonight. You should, too.$h
Entries.summer_1: Let's hope for lots of sun this summer! The animals need lots of time outside.
Entries.summer_10: Maybe I should put wine in the soup tomorrow...?$3
Entries.summer_27: I can't wait to watch the moon jellies together, sweetie.$h
Entries.fall_1: The weather's finally cooling down... What a relief!#$e#The animals are probably glad, too.
Entries.fall_15: I can't wait for the fair tomorrow. It's my favorite time of year!
Entries.fall_26: The decorations for tomorrow's festival are... interesting.$s#$e#I get scared easily...$s
Entries.winter_1: Brr... it's cold! I just want to stay inside where it's warm.#$e#The same goes for the animals! Make sure you buy them a heater.
Entries.winter_7: Should I enter the fishing contest tomorrow, honey?#$e#I might beat you!
Entries.winter_24: The feast is tomorrow... I can't wait!
Entries.winter_28: Let's celebrate a wonderful year together, sweetheart! [348]#$e#Drink up!$h
Entries.spouseRoom_Marnie: #$c .5#I should probably organize some of this stuff, huh?$h#$e#I'll be in here working on it for a while if you need me.
Entries.patio_Marnie: I'm glad there was room for a small coop. These little ones need to be near for extra help.

Entries.marriage_Mon.000: Hi, honey. Everything's going fine here at the shop... What a relief!
Entries.marriage_Wed.000: @! How nice of you visit. Don't worry! I'll be home at 5.
Entries.marriage_Fri.000: Oh, honey! Let's go to the saloon tonight! I get off at 5.
Entries.marriage_Fri.001: Wine is such a great way to relax after work.

Entries.Marnie0: You want to marry me...!#$e#You're so strange, @. But I can't wait to be your wife.$4
Entries.Marnie1: Shane agreed to take care of the ranch and Jas.#$e#Everything's falling into place... Just a couple more days!$h
